title: FS/For Trade: Jack Bliss American Beauty
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: FS/For Trade: Jack Bliss American Beauty
posts.post_content: CARD SOLD CARD SOLD !!  Up for sale is a raw Jack Bliss with American Beauty Back!  It's a nice looking card and is guaranteed original and unaltered (hasn't been trimmed, touched up etc).  My guess is it is a 2/2.5 (maybe a 3 with the right grader).  Asking SOLD but would consider offers and possibly trades for a similar condition Tolstoi, Cycle, EPDG common or maybe others.  Let's talk!
Card is sold.  Thanks for looking
